game.title: Echoes of Eternity
game.synopsis: In a world where time has no meaning, the fabric of reality is torn apart by a catastrophic event known as 'The Great Dissonance'. The remnants of humanity are left to pick up the pieces and navigate the shattered landscape. Players take on the role of a Temporal Archaeologist, tasked with uncovering the secrets of the past and restoring balance to the timestream.
game.beginning: The game begins with the player's character awakening in a desolate, post-apocalyptic wasteland with no memory of who they are or how they got there. As they explore their surroundings, they stumble upon an ancient artifact that imbues them with the ability to manipulate time.
game.ending: Ultimately, the player must face the mastermind behind The Great Dissonance: a powerful entity known only as 'The Time Reaver'. In a final showdown, the player must harness all of their knowledge and skills to repair the timestream and restore order to the universe. Depending on the player's choices throughout the game, multiple endings are possible, each with far-reaching consequences for the fate of humanity.
